article.title: U.S. Navy Modifies Low-band Transmitter Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sensor and Antenna Systems Incorporated, Lansdale, Pennsylvania, is being awarded a $38,956,741 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract to exercise an option for 48 low band transmitters; 13 vertical polarized antennas; and 28 horizontal polarized antennas associated with the AN/ALQ-99 low band transmitter.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
